Module codex.lb
Package codex.lb04.View.Cli

Class CliBoardModel

java.lang.Object
codex.lb04.View.Cli.CliBoardModel
public class CliBoardModel extends Object
simplified model to keep a copy of the game board when playing in CLI mode
